PackageData0.Name: ABProjectFiles
PackageData0.CommunityDescription: ABProjectFiles is a little file browser that focuses on the current project management. it allows you to view current project files and perform operations such as, opening, renaming creating and deleting items.

PackageFiles0.Name: abprojectfiles.lpk
PackageFiles0.Description:
ABProjectFiles is a little file browser that focuses on the current project management. it allows you to view current project files and perform operations such as, opening and renaming.

After installation goto: View -> Project Files
PackageFiles0.Author: Abdullahi Usman
